component.text:
Host attempts to access a web page or uses an optional client.
Network access is blocked until the wired or wireless host provides login information.

Host is redirected to a login page.
Cisco NAC Appliance validates username and password, also performs device and network scans to assess vulnerabilities on the device.

Device is noncompliant or login is incorrect.
Host is denied access and assigned to a quarantine role with access to online remediation resources.

Device is "clean".
Device is put on the "certified devices list" and is granted access to the network.
